name: Paramorphos
description:
Paramorphos is a short action-rpg demo made for "Keep Calm, Do Games" Russian online game festival. Trendy PS1-esque nostalgic thing.
Explore grim landscapes, fight the evil creatures, collect items, try to find the way out of the abandon monastery.

По-русски: модная ностальгическая поделка в стиле PS1.
Мало полигонов, низкое разрешение, странное управление - как в те времена, и т.д.

Music theme by Shima33: https://shima33.newgrounds.com

64-bit version of the game suports Dualshock 4 gamepad.
Both game versions supports XBox gamepads.

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/archaart
Follow Aardvark Games: https://twitter.com/indieaardvark
